computed_variables.name: mature_cestrum_count
computed_variables.description: The total number of mature Cestrum aurantiacum individuals observed in a plot, defined as those having a DBH measurement.
computed_variables.english_intent: Count the number of plants per plot that are identified as Cestrum aurantiacum and are considered mature (have a DBH measurement greater than 0).

compiled.code: return records.filter(r => (['Cestrum aurantiacum', 'cadelei', 'kisloar', 'Kage kisloar', 'Kobumn'].includes(r.spp_name_local_name)) && r.dbh_in_cms && parseFloat(r.dbh_in_cms) > 0).length;

evidence.snippet: Low: 0 mature individuals, but with presence of seedlings/saplings

computed_variables.name: invasion_intensity
computed_variables.description: Categorizes a plot's C. aurantiacum infestation level based on the count of mature individuals.
computed_variables.english_intent: Based on the count of mature Cestrum individuals, classify the plot as 'Low', 'Medium', 'High', or 'Very High'.

evidence.snippet:
Low: 0 mature individuals
Medium: 1-10 individuals
High: 11-30 individuals
Very High: >30 individuals

computed_variables.name: cestrum_individual_count
computed_variables.description: The total number of Cestrum aurantiacum individuals (of any size) observed in a plot.
computed_variables.english_intent: Sum the total number of individuals per plot where the species is identified as a variant of 'Cestrum aurantiacum'.

evidence.snippet: Invasive Recovery % regrowth of C. auranticum individuals

computed_variables.name: species_richness
computed_variables.description: The number of unique species present in a plot.
computed_variables.english_intent: Count the number of unique species names found within a plot.

evidence.snippet: Biodiversity Gains Increase in species richness

computed_variables.name: average_canopy_openness
computed_variables.description: The average canopy openness of the plot, from four directional readings (0-96 scale).
computed_variables.english_intent: Average the four canopy openness readings (North, East, South, West).

evidence.snippet: canopy_openness: Number of dots out of 96 imaginary dots that are not covered by the canopy

indicators.name: Invasive Recovery
indicators.definition: The percentage of regrowth of Cestrum aurantiacum individuals over time, indicating the effectiveness of removal efforts.

evidence.snippet: Invasive Recovery % regrowth of C. auranticum individuals

indicators.name: Biodiversity Gains
indicators.definition: The change in species richness over time, indicating an increase in biodiversity.

evidence.snippet: Biodiversity Gains Increase in species richness

indicators.name: Plot Invasion Level
indicators.definition: The initial baseline categorization of a plot based on the density of mature C. aurantiacum.
